ow.routing.chord
クラス ChordConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration
      ow.routing.linearwalker.LinearWalkerConfiguration
          ow.routing.chord.ChordConfiguration

public final class ChordConfiguration
extends LinearWalkerConfiguration

An instance of this class holds a configuration for Chord.
